ui.title: MERGE MANOR: LETTERS FROM TOMORROW
onboarding.e1.step1: Tap a generator to spawn an item.
onboarding.e2.step1: Open inventory and store an item.
onboarding.e3.step1: Create an eligible merge to trigger Time Echo.
onboarding.e3.step2: Choose one future in echo modal.
order.install_kitchen_lighting.title: Install Kitchen Lighting
order.install_kitchen_lighting.desc: Wire fresh lighting and mount cabinets.
order.restore_tower_top.title: Restore Tower Top
order.restore_tower_top.desc: Reinforce the top room and relay housing.
order.assemble_time_core.title: Assemble Time Core
order.assemble_time_core.desc: Fuse ocean crystal with chrono circuits.
order.garden_tea_for_guest.title: Garden Tea for Guest
order.garden_tea_for_guest.desc: Prepare a welcoming tray in the sunroom.
order.sunroom_brunch.title: Sunroom Brunch (Timed)
order.sunroom_brunch.desc: Serve brunch before the bell rings.
order.choose_library_desk.title: Choose Library Desk
order.choose_library_desk.desc: Build and wire a reading station.
order.repair_entry_clock.title: Repair Entry Clock
order.repair_entry_clock.desc: Bring the hallway clock back to life.
order.mystery_note_dust.title: Decode Dusty Note
order.mystery_note_dust.desc: Cross-reference coral marks and signal codes.
order.guest_evening_snack.title: Guest Evening Snack
order.guest_evening_snack.desc: Set out simple bites before dusk.
order.sunroom_light_study.title: Sunroom Light Study
order.sunroom_light_study.desc: Test reflected light in new frames.
letter.kitchen_glow.title: The Kitchen Glows
letter.kitchen_glow.body: Dear {player_name},\nTonight the kitchen answered back in light. Your choice made this room breathe again.
letter.tower_wind.title: Wind At The Tower
letter.tower_wind.body: The tower hums as if it remembers me. Keep listening when the air turns metallic.
letter.core_whisper.title: Core Whisper
letter.core_whisper.body: If the Time Core flickers, do not panic. It is only choosing which memory to trust.
letter.guest_warmth.title: Warmth Shared
letter.guest_warmth.body: A guest smiled at the tea. Little gestures stitch the manor together.
letter.brunch_clock.title: Brunch Clock
letter.brunch_clock.body: I timed the plates to the old bell. For a moment, morning felt repaired.
letter.library_echo.title: Echo In The Library
letter.library_echo.body: Behind the desk panel I found initials carved over initials. Someone kept returning.
letter.clock_tick.title: First Tick
letter.clock_tick.body: When the entry clock moved again, the dust lifted like applause.
letter.dust_map.title: Map In Dust
letter.dust_map.body: The dust lines were not random. They point toward {room_name}.
letter.twilight_snack.title: Twilight Snack
letter.twilight_snack.body: The manor is less lonely at dusk when the table is full.
letter.sunroom_light.title: Sunroom Study
letter.sunroom_light.body: Light bends on polished wood differently now. Your craftsmanship changed the room's voice.
letter.kitchen_modern.title: Future A: Modern Hearth
letter.kitchen_modern.body: Steel and glass made tomorrow look clear. We chose precision.
letter.kitchen_vintage.title: Future B: Vintage Hearth
letter.kitchen_vintage.body: Brass and oak made tomorrow feel familiar. We chose memory.
letter.beacon.title: Future A: Beacon Restored
letter.beacon.body: The coast saw us again. The light cut through fog and doubt.
letter.art_studio.title: Future B: Studio Above
letter.art_studio.body: Paint now dries where lanterns once burned. Beauty became our signal.
letter.hideaway.title: Future A: Hidden Core
letter.hideaway.body: Some truths are safer in shadow. The Core sleeps, guarded.
letter.showcase.title: Future B: Open Core
letter.showcase.body: The Core now stands in plain sight. Trust became our architecture.
